amendatorysection.chaptername: State University, State Colleges, And Postsecondary Education
amendatorysection.para: Any person who competes in the sport of football for the University of Nebraska-Lincoln may be granted a stipend, the amount of which shall be determined by the university. In addition, the university may in its discretion grant a stipend to persons who compete in sports other than football which participate in Big Ten Conference competition.

source.note: For the operative date for this section, see section 85-1,136.
